edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller

Class WapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller.BasicController
      • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.controller.WapController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotationController, ContainerController, PageController

    public abstract class WapController
extends BasicController
    Base class for all Wap Controllers where common behavior is implemented.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Detail

      • isValidServiceFormat

        protected abstract boolean isValidServiceFormat(Format format)
        Checks if the given format is usable for PUT/POST requests to the controllers service. This may be different services for different implementations.
        Parameters:
        format - The format to check
        Returns:
        true if supported, false otherwise

      • stripQuotes

        protected java.lang.String stripQuotes(java.lang.String quotedString)
        Strips the quotes from the start and the end of a given ETag.
        Parameters:
        quotedString - The quoted ETag
        Returns:
        The ETag without quotes

      • determineInputFormat

        protected Format determineInputFormat(java.lang.String contentTypeHeader,
                                      FormattableObject.Type type,
                                      JsonLdProfileRegistry profileRegistry,
                                      FormatRegistry formatRegistry)
        Determines the format provided by the client in the body of the request.
        An exception is thrown if format is invalid or not usable in PUT/POST requests.
        Parameters:
        contentTypeHeader - The value of the Content-Type header field
        type - Type of formattable object
        profileRegistry - The JSON-LD profile registry to use
        formatRegistry - The format registry
        Returns:
        The format if it could be determined and is valid for usage in PUT/POST requests

      • getContentNegotiator

        protected ContentNegotiator getContentNegotiator(java.lang.String acceptHeader,
                                                 FormattableObject.Type type,
                                                 JsonLdProfileRegistry profileRegistry,
                                                 FormatRegistry formatRegistry)
        Creates a content negotiator used to determine the response format.

        If acceptHeader is null or if content negotiation is disabled in WapServerConfig an instance is returned that will use the default formatter

        Parameters:
        acceptHeader - The accept header field, may be null
        type - Type of formattable object
        profileRegistry - The JSON-LD profile registry to use
        formatRegistry - The format registry
        Returns:
        The content negotiator to use
